A Psalm<S>4210</S> of David<S>1732</S>. LORD<S>3068</S>, I cry<S>7121</S> unto thee: make haste<S>2363</S> unto me; give ear<S>238</S> unto my voice<S>6963</S>, when I cry<S>7121</S> unto thee.
Let my prayer<S>8605</S> be set forth<S>3559</S> before<S>6440</S> thee as incense<S>7004</S>; and the lifting up<S>4864</S> of my hands<S>3709</S> as the evening<S>6153</S> sacrifice<S>4503</S>. <sup>set: Heb. directed</sup>
Set<S>7896</S> a watch<S>8108</S>, O LORD<S>3068</S>, before my mouth<S>6310</S>; keep<S>5341</S> the door<S>1817</S> of my lips<S>8193</S>.
Incline<S>5186</S> not my heart<S>3820</S> to any evil<S>7451</S> thing<S>1697</S>, to practise<S>5953</S> wicked<S>7562</S> works<S>5949</S> with men<S>376</S> that work<S>6466</S> iniquity<S>205</S>: and let me not eat<S>3898</S> of their dainties<S>4516</S>.
Let the righteous<S>6662</S> smite<S>1986</S> me; it shall be a kindness<S>2617</S>: and let him reprove<S>3198</S> me; it shall be an excellent<S>7218</S> oil<S>8081</S>, which shall not break<S>5106</S> my head<S>7218</S>: for yet my prayer<S>8605</S> also shall be in their calamities<S>7451</S>. <sup>me; it shall be a: or, let the rigteous smite mee kindly, and reprove me; let not their precious oil break my head, etc</sup>
When their judges<S>8199</S> are overthrown<S>8058</S> in stony<S>5553</S> places<S>3027</S>, they shall hear<S>8085</S> my words<S>561</S>; for they are sweet<S>5276</S>.
Our bones<S>6106</S> are scattered<S>6340</S> at the grave's<S>7585</S> mouth<S>6310</S>, as when one cutteth<S>6398</S> and cleaveth<S>1234</S> wood upon the earth<S>776</S>.
But mine eyes<S>5869</S> are unto thee, O GOD<S>3069</S> the Lord<S>136</S>: in thee is my trust<S>2620</S>; leave<S>6168</S> not my soul<S>5315</S> destitute<S>6168</S>. <sup>leave: Heb. make not my soul bare</sup>
Keep<S>8104</S> me from the snares<S>3027</S> <S>6341</S> which they have laid<S>3369</S> for me, and the gins<S>4170</S> of the workers<S>6466</S> of iniquity<S>205</S>.
Let the wicked<S>7563</S> fall<S>5307</S> into their own nets<S>4364</S>, whilst that I withal<S>3162</S> escape<S>5674</S>. <sup>escape: Heb. pass over</sup>
